mapper.select: SELECT * FROM lecture WHERE week_code IN (SELECT week_code FROM course_weekly WHERE course_code = #{courseCode}) ORDER BY week_code DESC

SELECT L.LECTURE_CODE, L.LECTURE_TITLE, L.WEEK_CODE, L.VIDEO_CODE, V.VIDEO_FILE_PATH, V.VIDEO_NAME, V.VIDEO_PLAY_TIME, V.VIDEO_EXTENSION, V.VIDEO_STORED_NAME FROM LECTURE L JOIN VIDEO V ON L.VIDEO_CODE = V.VIDEO_CODE WHERE L.WEEK_CODE = #{weekCode}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO student_lecture ( watch_code, watch_start_date, watch_accum_time, lecture_code, student_id, att_option ) VALUES ( 'W'||#{studentId}||#{lectureCode}, SYSDATE, #{watchAccumTime}, #{lectureCode}, #{studentId}, DEFAULT )

INSERT INTO student_note ( note_code, note_content, note_make, lecture_code, student_id) VALUES ( 'N'||LPAD(TO_CHAR(note_seq.NEXTVAL), 14, '0'), #{noteContent}, #{noteMake}, #{lectureCode}, #{studentId})
SELECT MAX(note_code) FROM student_note WHERE student_id = #{studentId} AND lecture_code = #{lectureCode}

INSERT INTO lecture_question ( lecture_question_num, week_code, lecture_question_title, lecture_question_content, lecture_question_reg_date, lecture_code, student_id ) VALUES ( 'Q'||LPAD(TO_CHAR(question_seq.NEXTVAL), 9, '0'), #{weekCode}, #{lectureQuestionTitle}, #{lectureQuestionContent}, #{lectureQuestionRegDate}, #{lectureCode}, #{studentId} )
SELECT MAX(lecture_question_num) FROM lecture_question WHERE student_id = #{studentId} AND lecture_code = #{lectureCode}
